oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Agrarpolitische Implikationen der Effizienz von Ökobetrieben – der Ökobetrieb als Infant Industry?
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Lakner, MSc Sebastian
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Farm economics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The following paper reports the results of a stochastic frontier model applied on 396 organic grassland farms in Germany from 1994/1995 to 2004/2005. The presented results focus on the technical efficiency (TE) scores during the conversion period. It could be shown, that the converting farms show lower TE-Scores than the average. The implications for the promotion of organic farms during the conversion period are discussed.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Lakner, MSc Sebastian (2009) Agrarpolitische Implikationen der Effizienz von Ökobetrieben – der Ökobetrieb als Infant Industry? Paper at: 10. Wissenschaftstagung Ökologischer Landbau, Zürich, 11.-13. Februar 2009.
